page.title: 11Playground games: Bromsgrove
page.content: {Games Children Play on the Playground {age 10-11 } Tig,Football,Stuck in the mud,Elastics you have a piece of elastic that you jump over in different ways,Deaths dark vale,Cat and Mouse one person is a cat and one is a mouse the cat chases the mouse and tries to tig them,Tig on lines it is just like tig exept you run along lines,Detectives, Acky 123,Telescope. {Games Children Play on the Playground {age 6-7 Tig,Adventure games,Stuck in the mud,Football,Fairys,Monsters,May I,One gypsy came a riding,May I cross your golden bridge on the way to school,Tig off ground,Mystery games.
